bio.en: Lee Seung-koo is a professor of Tourism Management in Kangwon National University with a doctor's degree in business administration earned from University of Mississippi. In FingeRate, he organizes activities for finding, developing, supporting marketing solutions for vitalizing Tourism Leisure and MICE industry.
Park Minjung is a representative of GO Information Technology corporation and chairman of Gangwon ICT Association. He provides advice and information on big data of Gangwon tourism to FingeRate.

Jang Yongkeon studied electronic engineering in Dankook University. He served as manager of KT Gwanghwamun branch, Busan customer center and as director of Korea ICT Convergence Association. Now he is representative of Imotech corporation and recognized as an IT expert by providing consulting to companies regarding how to build and enhance communication system, standardizing of IoT and by establishing internet connection. In FingeRate, he is in charge of blockchain security.
Wang Jaejin served as a representative of former Hanaro Information Communications and now he is in charge of site support in Bot sector of FingeRate.

Jeong Yeonkoo works for Shinhan Financial Group and is in charge of providing financial consulting and sharing policy and technology withim the existing financial society as a financial expert in FingeRate.
Jang Sungil is a representative of Withnet corporation and in charge of planning general blockchain service in FingeRate.
Kim Dukho is a representative of DK corporation and in charge of China-related business in FingeRate.
You Yeunkeun used to be a team leader of Prime Information and Communications. He is now a representative of Neo C&I and in charge of blockchain infrastructure design in FingeRate.
Kim Kyungroc is a diamond artist and supports for tourism retail system in FingeRate.
Baek Gichang is a representative of 봄내 EnC and provides support to FingeRate for CCE-Crypto ATM technology used in tourism blockchain.

Kang Sangwon worked as a member of advisory committee for the 2014/2018 Pyeongchang Winter Olympic biding committee with a wide range of experiences in international events and tourism. He is now a representative of KT's public customers main office and he provides FingeRate with support regarding big data and blockchain.
Choi Hyunjang is a chief researcher of KID and works as professional advisor of tourism cities for FingeRate.
Shim Jeongyong is a representative of Squarebase corporation and in charge of developing web site and application of FingeRate.

Shim Kyuyong worked for credit business department in the National Agricultural Cooperative Federation and now he is a head of business management department in 지앤 corporation. He is in charge of supporting blockchain administration in FingeRate.
Lee Hoyeon manages and operates tourism system in FingeRate.
